Name: Danganronpa: The Animation
Japanese_name: Danganronpa Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation
Tags: Mystery, Animeism, Battle Royale, High Stakes Games, Play or Die, Psychological, PVP, Based on a Video Game, Violence
Description: 'Hope’s Peak Private Academy is a super-exclusive institute that gathers the best and the brightest, provides them with a world-class education, and propels them into any career they wish. At least, that’s what the average student Naegi used to think. Having been accepted into a class of 15 students\xa0through a lottery system, the boy quickly comes to learn that Hope’s Peak is no ordinary school. In reality, he and the group find themselves trapped inside and learn that the only way to "graduate" is to murder a fellow student and fool everyone in a trial that determines life or death! Led by the whimsically-cruel, teddy-bear-like Monobear, Naegi and the others must\xa0do whatever it takes to escape this bizarre, deadly game.'

Name: Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak Academy- Despair Arc
Japanese_name: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen: Zetsubou-hen
Tags: Mystery, High Stakes Games, Play or Die, Psychological, Based on a Video Game, Violence
Description: 'Hope’s Peak\xa0High School is a special school that nurtures those with exceptional talents\xa0and abilities. While only top students are a part of the main course, anyone can join the\xa0preparatory course, like Haijme Hinata has. Hinata wants nothing more than to be part\xa0of the talented elite, but his desires lead him to a fateful encounter that drives the future\xa0of the school into despair.'

Name: Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak Academy- Future Arc
Japanese_name: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen: Mirai-hen
Tags: Mystery, High Stakes Games, Play or Die, Psychological, Based on a Video Game, Violence
Description: 'Makoto Naegi is under suspicion of treason after shielding a remnant of Despair. The\xa0Future Foundation, founded to save the world from chaos caused by Ultimate Despair,\xa0gathers to decide his punishment when they are captured by Monokuma. Thrusted into\xa0an ultimate death game, they must find the true traitor and kill him if they hope to\xa0survive. The tale of despair in which hope kills hope begins.'
